entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esther 10:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: E 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5 except minus 14 over northern sections.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 14 over northern sections. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
